about_the_game:
The official Shardpunk Soundtrack captures the post-ratpocalyptic world of the game.
Whether you are at home, or outside, indulge yourself in the post apocalyptic mood of Shardpunk with 13 tracks composed by Michał Ratkowski, who has previously worked on 60 Seconds!, Terrordrome: Reign of the Legends, Bad Dream Coma, Uboat, and many more.
